plugins/sms/plugin_info/configuration.ph.A utiliser si vous ne recevez pas de mes: Use this if you are not receiving messages. This ensures compatibility with most modems but removes multiple SMS support and special characters.
plugins/sms/plugin_info/configuration.ph.Passerelle SMS / SMS Gateway (modifer ca: TEXT Gateway (change in case of error CMS 330 - SMSC number not set)
plugins/sms/plugin_info/configuration.ph.Utiliser le code #*#*4636#*#* sur un mob: Utiliser the code #*#*4636#*#* on a mobile device to obtain the SMSC of your operator
plugins/sms/plugin_info/configuration.ph.Port socket interne (modification danger: Internal socket port (Warning: must be the same on all slaves)
plugins/sms/plugin_info/configuration.ph.Etes-vous sur de vouloir lancer le démon: Are you sure you want to run the daemon in debug mode? Remember to restart it in normal mode when you are finished.
plugins/sms/plugin_info/configuration.ph.Découper les messages par paquet de cara: Découper les messages par paquet de caractères
plugins/sms/plugin_info/configuration.ph.Passerelle SMS / SMS Gateway (modifer ca: Passerelle SMS / SMS Gateway (modifer cas d'erreur : CMS 330 SMSC number not set)

plugins/sms/plugin_info/info.xml.Plugin permettant de gérer les SMS: Plugin permettant de gérer les SMS

plugins/sms/plugin_info/info.json.Plugin permettant d'ajouter le support d: Plugin permettant d'ajouter le support de clef GSM (pour les SMS uniquement)
